alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 9:35AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands, Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands
